issue.title: [Website] Merge script/CI do not recognize MINOR PRs
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-15513](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15513). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
While pretty…minor, it would be nice for consistency. Unless we just directly merge PRs through GitHub for the website in this case?
